titleStmt.title: The first and second part of The remedy of loue. VVritten by Sir Thomas Ouerbury Knight
Remedia amoris. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
Overbury, Thomas, Sir, 1581-1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, and are to be sold by Iohn VVels at his shop in Fetter-lane and in the Temple,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Ovid. Remedia amoris.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: The remedy of loue.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
